message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $12,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort you've put into making this product available. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product can bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After reviewing your latest offer, I would like to counter with a price of $10,500 for the product.

I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob. I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $11,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous discussions and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $11,000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. However, I'm willing to give you a slight discount to sweeten the deal. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $11,200. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to make a final counteroffer of $11,100 for the product.

I'm not willing to budge any further, Bob. I've already given you a significant discount from my initial offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,200, but I'm not going any lower. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.
